title: Initialize reply
description: The reply whether initializing 2300 has succeeded.

session_id.description: An arbitrary string, filled in in the request, which is copied into the reply object.

status.description: "success" or "failure", depending on whether the command executed successfully.

payload.description: If "status" == "failure": a string describing the failure in more detail.

version.description: String containing the version number of the message format.
